about_the_game:
Pantheon Rift is a prototype/prologue to our future unannounced title. Pantheon Rift will be released as a playable, but aspects are subject to change.

Step into the battle of this thrilling party-style battle arena, where your only weapon is medieval style weapons and your sole objective is to take down other players while avoiding the constant environmental chaos and destruction.

The game is designed to be fast-paced and intense, with matches lasting just a few minutes each. To emerge victorious, players must navigate through a destructible environment that is full of obstacles and dangers, and use their sword skills to defeat their opponents.

Adaptability and strategy are essential, as the environment can change rapidly, leaving players vulnerable to surprise attacks from both other players and the environment itself.

As the game progresses, the stakes get higher, and the environment becomes more chaotic and destructive, making survival even more challenging. Only the strongest and most skilled players will be able to emerge as champions.

With its unpredictable environment and high-octane action, this party-style battle arena promises an exhilarating gaming experience. Grab your sword, stay alert, and fight for your life!

Core Features

  • The Weather System - contend with not only your enemies, but the weather too. We won’t give too much away, but let’s say you’re an archer, maybe you fire into the wind and the arrow loses its speed, perhaps it will do less damage?

  • Game is entirely made in Unreal Engine 5, with striking graphics allowing for full immersion.

  • Souls-Like combat where you will be swiping with your sword, dodging, and staggering your way to victory.

  • Hundreds of cosmetics from steel armors to silly baker’s aprons.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / AMD CPU with 4 physical cores @ 3Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
